p: Using a convenience sampling approach (Neuman 2006), the podcast creator interviewed five key informants in the field of podcasts to determine viability of the BGC idea. Interviews were conducted with other women of color in the podcasting world, such as the Founder of Women of Color Podcasters, Danielle Desir, the host of Desi Women Diaspora, Mala Kumar, and Kristy Drutman of Brown Girl Green.
